title: TWIN PETES INVESTING INTERVIEWS WITH ENERGISE AFRICA'S CEO RAY COYLE
description:
Welcome to the first episode of the Twin Petes Investing Interviews with Peter Higgins.

In this exclusive interview with Ray Coyle, CEO of Energise Africa we discuss the following:
His early career path and and fascinating legal and award-winning entrepreneurial journey prior to becoming the CEO of Energise Africa.
What attracted him to become the CEO of Energise Africa.
The crowdfunding impact investing role Energise Africa plays in helping to raise funds for renewable projects across sub Saharan Africa.
The due diligence and on the ground local research that Energise Africa undertakes when selecting businesses and projects to help raise funds for.
How Energise Africa provides affordable and flexible finance through crowd investing to African run companies, where implement their strategies to provide clean energy to families in Africa.
The risks and success rate of projects supported.
The Innovative Finance ISA.
How the Energise Africa IFISA works.
The keys trends shaping the Renewable Energy sector in Africa.
The main reasons why it is wise to invest in Renewable Energy and Clean Energy including Solar at this time & much more.

Are you looking to use your tax-free Innovative Finance ISA allowance to make a positive impact and also do something good for the environment? Then Energise Africa's IFISA lets you invest from £50 to help tackle climate change, help families across the African continent and target tax-free returns of up to 8%. To find out more click this link:
https://www.energiseafrica.com?utm_source=Conkers_Twin_Petes&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=Conkers_Podcast_2025

If you are new to this podcast, please let me take a moment to explain “Twin Petes Investing” is a collaboration between Twitter investing personalities Peter Higgins (conkers)  @conkers3 and the Award Breaking Pete (WheelieDealer) @WheelieDealer. We have several decades of involvement and experience of the stock market, stocks, shares, funds, fundamental analysis, technical analysis and dealing with volatility. We are Full Time Investors who find the day-to-day rigours of the ever-changing quest to make financial returns from the increasingly volatile markets fascinating. Just for clarity other than when we are presenting Twin Petes Investing LIVE at events as we have been fortunate to do at Mello Events, we are conducting our podcasts from completely different locations, with one of us in Windsor, Berkshire and the other in Leicestershire.

It was a huge pleasure performing the TwinPetesInvesting podcast LIVE to the MelloEvents MelloVirtual audience on July 10th 2020. We both had a blast and our allotted time just flew. Thank you to those that attended our live session and make it so special. However none of this would have been possible without this kindness shown to us by @Carmensfella David Stredder, the founder and owner of MelloEvents and his wonderful team Anne, Georgina, Richard & others. Thank you all very much! 

Pete and I thoroughly enjoyed the positive feedback and interactions we had at MelloVirtual. It was great to be able to see each other on the screens and to take questions directly from listeners and fans of the TwinPetesInvesting podcasts. Thank you all for your kind words and continued support. It is very much appreciated. Here is the recording of our LIVE show at MelloVirtual 2020 for your listening pleasure and we hope you will enjoy it.

title: CONKERS' CORNER at MELLOLONDON Part 4 with Jonathan
description:
At a busy MELLOLONDON 2018 CONKERS' CORNER captured the viewpoint of some of the MELLO community whilst the air was filled with excitement. In this fourth short video private investor, finance graduate and now heating engineer Jonathan, shares with us what he enjoyed so much about the two day Mello event. 

Watch this video now as Jonathan who studied and gained Post Graduate Diploma in Finance and Investments speaks of meeting Professor Glen Arnold one of the very individuals whose text books he had studied during his time as a student. 

Jonathan speaks of enjoying listening to top speakers, meeting CEO's, chatting with FireAngel management and other companies of interest. He felt is was "amazing to be in a room with these Chief Executives, Chair people and listening to all their knowledge".

Many thanks to David Stredder founder and owner of Mello Events for permission to film at the Mello London event in Chiswick.

Did you enjoy this video? Then please share it with you friends and social media communities, leave your feedback and also subscribe to this Conkers' Corner Youtube Channel. Thank you.

title: CONKERS' CORNER Interview with Lord John Lee of Trafford, the first ISA Millionaire
INTERVIEW WITH PROFESSOR DANA BROWN : BEYOND BUSINESS AS USUAL
description:
INTERVIEW WITH PROFESSOR DANA BROWN Pro-Vice Chancellor of Enterprise for Leicester De Montfort University and Principal of Leicester Castle Business School

Welcome to this CONKERS’ CORNER CORPORATE interview completed on behalf on Cross Productions for Niche Magazine. In this interview, I have the pleasure of speaking with Professor Dana Brown, the Pro Vice Chancellor of Enterprise for Leicester De Montfort University and the Principal of Leicester Castle Business School.

Professor Dana Brown is a global thought-leader with regards to business, academia and executive education. She holds a PhD from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) and an MPhil from the University of Oxford, where she studied as a Rhodes Scholar. Prior to joining De Montfort University, Leicester (DMU), Dana was the Director of the MBA at Saïd Business School, University of Oxford and has also worked as a professor and leader in business schools around the world.

Leicester’s DMU has been rated as one of the UK’s best for teaching excellence.http://www.dmu.ac.uk/about-dmu/the-teaching-excellence-framework/the-teaching-excellence-framework-gold.aspx

The ful Conkers3 written article can be found here : 
https://www.conkers3.com/interview-with-professor-dana-brown-of-leicester-castle-business-school-beyond-business-as-usual/

The Conkers3 Podcasts can be found :
  https://audioboom.com/channels/4937399

The Conkers3 Podcast can be found on Apple iTunes
https://itunes.apple.com/gb/podcast/conkers-corner/id1384481834?mt=2

This #CONKERSCORNER CORPORATE interview was completed Peter Higgins of Conkers3 Ltd on behalf of Cross Productions and has been published in the July /August 2018 edition of Niche Magazine https://issuu.com/niche-magazine/docs/niche_magazine_issue_27/92 This video was filmed and produced by Corporate Motion and the music is by Mix Factory.
